title: Cluster Spacecraft 2 FluxGate Magnetometer (FGM) Spin-Resolution Parameters - Andre Balogh>a.balogh@imperial.ac.uk & Elizabeth Lucek>e.lucek@imperial.ac.uk & ESA CAA (Imperial College)

info.x_cadence_note: Counts based on variable 'time_tags__C2_CP_FGM_SPIN' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/cluster/c2/cp/2001/c2_cp_fgm_spin_20010130_v01.cdf. The most common cadence, 4017 [ms] = PT4.017S, occurred for 91.7595% of the 824 timesteps.
info.contact: Andre Balogh>a.balogh@imperial.ac.uk & Elizabeth Lucek>e.lucek@imperial.ac.uk & ESA CAA @ Imperial College
